articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo Jr, who turned ten in June, was enrolled in the Juve youth system and much like his old man, has banged in the goals.
He marked his debut by scoring four goals on his debut in a 7-… [+1357 chars]

articles.title: Goalkeeper to make 500th league appearance - Gloucestershire Live
articles.description: Landmark for 34-year-old on comeback from long injury absence
articles.content:
Scott Flnders will make his 500th career league appearance as he returns to League Two action for Cheltenham Town at Carlisle United on Saturday.
